title: Ihe ịrịba ama na aha - Ụlọ nsọ Orbital
heading: Ihe ịrịba ama & Nkwupụta
description: Ihe osise a nwere ọtụtụ afọ bụ akụkụ nke 13th Mercosul Bienal na Porto Alegre, Brazil, nke Marcelo Dantas chepụtara. Edepụtala ya ogologo oge maka ihe nrite Lumen 2022 - Award Futures. Ọ meriwokwa otu ArtSat nke asọmpi CubeDesign 2021, nke ụlọ ọrụ nyocha mbara igwe nke Brazil (INPE) kwalitere.
